00070 #define RADIO_STATUS_START_VALUE                  ( 0x40 )

00080 typedef enum{
00081     RADIO_SUCCESS = RADIO_STATUS_START_VALUE,  
00082     RADIO_UNSUPPORTED_DEVICE,         
00083     RADIO_INVALID_ARGUMENT,           
00084     RADIO_TIMED_OUT,                  
00085     RADIO_WRONG_STATE,                
00086     RADIO_BUSY_STATE,                 
00087     RADIO_STATE_TRANSITION_FAILED,    
00088     RADIO_CCA_IDLE,                   
00089     RADIO_CCA_BUSY,                   
00090     RADIO_TRX_BUSY,                   
00091     RADIO_BAT_LOW,                    
00092     RADIO_BAT_OK,                     
00093     RADIO_CRC_FAILED,                 
00094     RADIO_CHANNEL_ACCESS_FAILURE,     
00095     RADIO_NO_ACK,                     
00096 }radio_status_t;
